# AI Daily Harvest

> Daily AI content feed. 40+ sources, scored and structured. JSON for agents, Markdown for humans, JSONL for training.

## What you get

- Every article scored 0-100 with a verdict (must_read / worth_reading / neutral / noise / overhyped)
- Learning-ready fields: highlights, core_point (Claim → Evidence → Implication), why_matters
- Bilingual coverage: English tech blogs + Chinese WeChat AI accounts

## First step

Today's picks:
  GET https://raw.githubusercontent.com/makinotes/ai-daily-harvest/master/lists/daily-picks.json

## Files

- data/{date}.json — Full articles with all fields
- daily/{date}.md — Human-readable digest
- lists/daily-picks.json — Today's picks by verdict
- datasets/scored-articles.jsonl — Cumulative scored dataset (427+ articles)
- feeds/rss.xml — RSS 2.0 feed (rolling 50 items)
- feeds/weekly/{year}-W{week}.md — Weekly trend analysis
- indexes/by-category.json — 30-day articles by topic
- indexes/trending.json — 7-day trending keywords

## Full guide

See llms-full.txt for complete schema, use cases, and integration patterns.
